snippet: Former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida has written a fund-raising letter saying his son George P. Bush “is considering” running for Texas land commissioner.
abstract: Former Florida Gov Jeb Bush writes fund-raising letter suggesting that his son George P Bush might run for Texas land commissioner.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Jeb Bush of Florida has written a fund-raising letter saying his son George P. Bush “is considering” running for Texas land commissioner.

headline.main: Texas: Jeb Bush Hints at His Son’s Political Ambition
headline.print_headline: Texas: Jeb Bush Hints at His Son’s Political Ambition
